  implicit none
  character(len=100) :: line1, str1, str2, u
  integer :: a, b, X, Y, N, Z
  integer, parameter :: MOD = 1000000007
  character(LEN=1), dimension(0:3) :: char_map = (/ 'A', 'C', 'G', 'T' /)
  integer, allocatable :: memo(:,:)
  integer :: current, state, c1, c2, c3, next_char, new_state
  integer :: i, temp, total
  logical :: ok
  integer(8) :: temp_memo

  ! First part: read inputs and compute X and Y

  read(line1, *) str1, str2

  read(*, '(A)') u

     Y = b
  else
     X = a
     Y = b -1
  end if

  N = X

  ! Second part: compute Z using DP
  allocate( memo(0:N, 0:63) )
  memo = 0
  memo(0, 63) = 1  ! initial state is TTT (3,3,3) → state 63

  do current = 0, N-1

        if (memo(current, state) ==0) cycle
        c1 = state /16
        remainder = state mod16
        c2 = remainder /4
        c3 = remainder mod4
        do next_char =0,3

        end do

  end do

  total = 0
  do state =0,63
     total = mod( total + memo(N, state), MOD ) end do
  Z = total

  ! Third part: compute the result

  result_third = (Z /3)*2 + merge(1,0, mod(Z,3)/=0)

program main
  implicit none
  character(len=100) :: line1, str1, str2, u
  integer :: a, b, X, Y, N, Z
  integer, parameter :: MOD = 1000000007
  character(LEN=1), dimension(0:3) :: char_map = (/ 'A', 'C', 'G', 'T' /)
  integer, allocatable :: memo(:,:)
  integer :: current, state, c1, c2, c3, next_char, new_state
  integer :: i, temp, total
  logical :: ok
  integer(8) :: temp_memo

  ! First part: read inputs and compute X and Y
  read(*, '(A)') line1
  read(line1, *) str1, str2
  read(*, *) a, b
  read(*, '(A)') u

  if (u == str1) then
     X = a -1
     Y = b
  else
     X = a
     Y = b -1
  end if

  N = X

  ! Second part: compute Z using DP
  allocate( memo(0:N, 0:63) )
  memo = 0
  memo(0, 63) = 1  ! initial state is TTT (3,3,3) → state 63

  do current = 0, N-1
     do state = 0, 63
        if (memo(current, state) ==0) cycle
        c1 = state /16
        remainder = state mod16
        c2 = remainder /4
        c3 = remainder mod4
        do next_char =0,3
           integer :: four_chars(4)
           four_chars = [c1, c2, c3, next_char]
           ok = isOK(four_chars)
           if (ok) then
              new_state = ( (state mod16)*4 + next_char )
              memo(current+1, new_state) = mod( memo(current+1, new_state) + memo(current, state), MOD )
           end if
        end do
     end do
  end do

  total = 0
  do state =0,63
     total = mod( total + memo(N, state), MOD )
  end do
  Z = total

  ! Third part: compute the result
  integer :: result_third
  result_third = (Z /3)*2 + merge(1,0, mod(Z,3)/=0)

  print *, result_third

contains

  logical function isOK(four_chars)
    integer, intent(in) :: four_chars(4)
    character(len=4) :: s, s_swapped
    integer :: i, temp_char
    s = char_map(four_chars(1)) // char_map(four_chars(2)) // char_map(four_chars(3)) // char_map(four_chars(4))
    if (index(s, 'AGC') >0) then
       isOK = .false.
       return
    end if
    do i =1,3
       s_swapped = s
       temp_char = ichar(s_swapped(i:i))
       s_swapped(i:i) = s_swapped(i+1:i+1)
       s_swapped(i+1:i+1) = char(temp_char)
       if (index(s_swapped, 'AGC') >0) then
          isOK = .false.
          return
       end if
    end do
    isOK = .true.
  end function isOK

end program main
